mapper.insert:

mapper.delete:

mapper.select: select a.id, a.demand_id, a.customer_code, a.bind_time, a.bind_people, a.download_status, a.newfollowtime, a.trackz_peoname, a.resume_enclosurepath from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime= b.trackingtime where b.follow_status not in (4,6,8) and demand_id = #{demandId}

SELECT a.demand_id, b.customer_code, b.customer_name FROM mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo b ON a.customer_code = b.customer_code where a.customer_code = #{customerCode} and a.demand_id=#{demandId} limit 1

SELECT a.customer_code as customerCode, b.demand_id as demandId,b.project_name as projectName, c.corp_code as corpCode,c.corp_name as corpName,a.bind_people as opercode, c.payback_period as paybackPeriod FROM mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demand b ON a.demand_id = b.demand_id LEFT JOIN mar_company c ON b.corp_code = c.corp_code WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT c.customer_name as customerName ,c.customer_tel as customerTel, a.customer_code as customerCode, a.demand_id as demandId,b.follow_status as followStatus, DATE_FORMAT(b.trackingtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as trackingtime from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code where 1=1 and a.bind_people =#{AddPeople} and DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and b.follow_status=#{followStatus} order by trackingtime desc

SELECT c.customer_name ,c.customer_tel , a.customer_code , a.demand_id ,b.follow_status, DATE_FORMAT(b.trackingtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as trackingtime, DATE_FORMAT(f.interview_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as interview_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time, g.project_name from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime= b.trackingtime LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_waitinginterview f on a.demand_id=f.demand_id and a.customer_code=f.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_demand g on a.demand_id=g.demand_id where 1=1 and a.bind_people =#{AddPeople} and DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and (b.follow_status >=3 and b.follow_status!=4) order by trackingtime desc

SELECT c.customer_name,c.customer_tel , a.customer_code , a.demand_id ,b.follow_status, g.project_name from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime= b.trackingtime LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_demand g on a.demand_id=g.demand_id where 1=1 and a.bind_people =#{AddPeople} and DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and (b.follow_status >=5 and b.follow_status!=6) order by trackingtime desc

SELECT c.customer_name,c.customer_tel , a.customer_code , a.demand_id ,b.follow_status, DATE_FORMAT(b.trackingtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as trackingtime, DATE_FORMAT(f.interview_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as interview_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time, g.project_name from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_waitinginterview f on a.demand_id=f.demand_id and a.customer_code=f.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_demand g on a.demand_id=g.demand_id where 1=1 and a.bind_people =#{AddPeople} and DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and b.follow_status=#{followStatus} order by trackingtime desc

SELECT COUNT(a.bind_people) as sd from mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b on a.id=b.demandresume_id where DATE_FORMAT( b.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and b.follow_status=#{followStatus} GROUP BY a.bind_people ORDER BY sd desc LIMIT 1

SELECT a.project_name as projectName,d.customer_name as customerName, a.demand_id as demandId, DATE_FORMAT(c.trackingtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as trackingtime from mar_demand a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresume b on a.demand_id=b.demand_id LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow c on b.id=c.demandresume_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo d on b.customer_code=d.customer_code where a.operationuser=#{userName} and c.follow_status=#{followStatus} and DATE_FORMAT( c.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) order by c.trackingtime desc

SELECT a.project_name,d.customer_name,b.customer_code,d.customer_tel, a.demand_id, DATE_FORMAT(c.trackingtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as trackingtime, DATE_FORMAT(f.interview_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as interview_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as begin_time, DATE_FORMAT(f.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time from mar_demand a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresume b on a.demand_id=b.demand_id LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow c on b.id=c.demandresume_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo d on b.customer_code=d.customer_code LEFT JOIN mar_waitinginterview f on b.demand_id=f.demand_id and b.customer_code=f.customer_code where a.operationuser=#{userName} and c.follow_status=#{followStatus} and DATE_FORMAT( c.trackingtime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) order by c.trackingtime desc

SELECT c.customer_name,a.outof_projecttime,a.quit_proreason from mar_customerprojectpay a LEFT JOIN mar_demand b on a.demand_id=b.demand_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code where b.operationuser=#{userName} and DATE_FORMAT( a.outof_projecttime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

SELECT count(c.customer_code) as sd from mar_customerprojectpay a LEFT JOIN mar_demand b on a.demand_id=b.demand_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code where b.operationuser=#{userName} and DATE_FORMAT( a.outof_projecttime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{lastMonth} , '%Y%m' ) LIMIT 1

SELECT c.customer_name,a.outof_projecttime,a.quit_proreason from mar_customerprojectpay a LEFT JOIN mar_demand b on a.demand_id=b.demand_id LEFT JOIN per_customerinfo c on a.customer_code=c.customer_code where b.operationuser=#{userName} and DATE_FORMAT( a.outof_projecttime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

SELECT a.id,a.demand_id,a.customer_code,a.bind_people,b.follow_status as download_status FROM mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b ON a.id = b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime=b.trackingtime where a.demand_id=#{demandId} and b.follow_status in (1,3,5)

SELECT a.id,a.demand_id,a.customer_code,a.newfollowtime,b.follow_status as download_status FROM mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b ON a.id = b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime=b.trackingtime where a.newfollowtime <#{newfollowtime} and b.follow_status in (1,3,5)

SELECT a.id,a.demand_id,a.customer_code,a.bind_people,b.follow_status as download_status FROM mar_demandresume a LEFT JOIN mar_demandresumefollow b ON a.id = b.demandresume_id and a.newfollowtime=b.trackingtime where a.demand_id=#{demandId} and a.customer_code =#{customerCode}
